name: Abandon Ship! 16/02/2012 Guestlist ticket
description:
Abandon Ship! is back for its second event, and this one will be explosive! With a quartet of bands followed by an alternative DJ set running until 2am, a must attend for Leicester's alternative music lover.
Pop punk/Hardcore/Metal/Rock will be played by the DJ and requests will be played!

Live bands:

Some May Run
This Leicester four piece bring energy to every gig of theirs, with breakdowns that will melt your face and the essence of hardcore in their music, you're sure to sweat in the moshpit to Some May Run
http://www.facebook.com/somemayrun

They Say Fall
They Say Fall have featured in Kerrang! magazine and Front magazine, and placed third in the Kerrang! Rising Records competition and the Kerrang! Slam Dunk competition. A must see for any post hardcore fan.
http://www.facebook.com/theysayfall

Embrace The Tide
With a self-produced Full Length album already under their belts, an EP soon to be released, and a recently released official music video of their new track 'Fake it 'til you make it', 2011 is set to be a promising year for Embrace the Tide and their fans as they stand highly as one of the most promising young bands in the UK.
http://www.facebook.com/embracethetide

+DJ set, playing the biggest and best in alternative/pop-punk/hardcore

Doors at 8pm
Venue is The Soundhouse, Leicester

More details can be found at www.facebook.com/AbandonShipUK
